column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Get the sausage crumbs and classic peppers
column2: even if that isn't usually how you get pizza. I'm from New York
column3: and if you asked me to compare the best NYC pizza to Lou's I'd tell you they're a separate category and can't be compared
column4: but man Lou's gives any pizza place I've ever been to a run for its money.
